bill.title: Mississippi Consumer Choice in Uninsured Motorist Coverage Act; create.
bill.description: An Act To Create The Mississippi Consumer Choice In Uninsured Motorist Coverage Act; To Amend Section 83-11-101, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Allow Motor Vehicle Owners The Option Of Knowingly Purchasing An Economic-only Policy Of Uninsured Motorist Bodily Injury Liability Coverage Instead Of The Traditional Coverage; To Exclude Certain Coverage From The Uninsured Motorist Property Damage Liability Coverage; To Bring Forward Sections 83-11-102, 83-11-103, 83-11-105, 83-11-107, 83-11-109 And 83-11-111, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Regard Uninsured Motorist Coverage, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
